infotexts.missiondescription.killbombsharks1: A pack of Bomb Sharks has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] marks has been promised to any crew that can neutralize it.
infotexts.missionsuccess.killbombsharks1: The Bomb Sharks have been terminated.
infotexts.missionmessage0.killbombsharks1: The Bomb Sharks have been killed. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.
infotexts.missiondescription.killseaurchins1: A pack of Sea Urchins led by a queen has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] marks has been promised to any crew that can neutralize it.
infotexts.missionsuccess.killseaurchins1: The Sea Urchins have been terminated.
infotexts.missionmessage0.killseaurchins1: The Sea Urchins have been killed. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.
infotexts.missiondescription.seaurchinnest: A sea urchin nest was recently discovered in a cave near [location1]. A reward of [reward] marks has been promised to any crew that can get rid of the nest.
infotexts.missionmessage0.seaurchinnest: The nest has been wiped out. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.
infotexts.missiondescription.bombsharknest: A bombshark nest was recently discovered in a cave near [location1]. A reward of [reward] marks has been promised to any crew that can get rid of the nest.
infotexts.missionmessage0.bombsharknest: The nest has been wiped out. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.
infotexts.entitydescription.bombsharkegg: A hideous, grotesque Bombshark Egg. Littered with boils and seems to be slightly moving... as if breathing.
